rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Everyone's talking about scary things
a lot right now, but sometimes we get
good news.

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Like, I found out Rhys and the others
are safe in Avaritia!

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Dad says he'll take me to see them
once all the fighting settles down.

rows.label: tlk41200141_05_msg0004
rows.name:
I never thought I'd get to see my
friends again... Ahh, I can't wait!
